languages.text: "О, во сне я порой успеваю даже спасти Империум пару раз". {n}Соломон отвечает натянутой улыбкой, в глазах ни намека на смех.{/n}
"Oh, in my dreams I sometimes even manage to save the Imperium a couple of times over," {n}Solomorne replies with a strained smile, not a hint of mirth in his eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О, во сне я порой успеваю даже спасти Империум пару раз". {n}Соломон отвечает натянутой улыбкой, в глазах ни намека на смех.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh, in my dreams I sometimes even manage to save the Imperium a couple of times over," {n}Solomorne replies with a strained smile, not a hint of mirth in his eyes.{/n}

"Oh, in my dreams I sometimes even manage to save the Imperium a couple of times over," {n}Solomorne replies with a strained smile, not a hint of mirth in his eyes.{/n}

languages.text: « Oh, dans mes rêves, il m'arrive même de sauver tout l'Imperium, » {n}répond Solomorne avec un sourire forcé, sans la moindre joie dans ses yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, in my dreams I sometimes even manage to save the Imperium a couple of times over," {n}Solomorne replies with a strained smile, not a hint of mirth in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh, dans mes rêves, il m'arrive même de sauver tout l'Imperium, » {n}répond Solomorne avec un sourire forcé, sans la moindre joie dans ses yeux.{/n}

languages.text: 「ええ。夢の中では何度か帝国を救ったこともあります」{n}ソロモーンは引きつった笑みを浮かべて答えたが、その目には笑いのかけらもなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, in my dreams I sometimes even manage to save the Imperium a couple of times over," {n}Solomorne replies with a strained smile, not a hint of mirth in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ええ。夢の中では何度か帝国を救ったこともあります」{n}ソロモーンは引きつった笑みを浮かべて答えたが、その目には笑いのかけらもなかった。{/n}

languages.text: «Bueno, en algunos sueños hasta logro salvar el Imperium varias veces». {n}La sonrisa de Solomorne es forzada y no alcanza sus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, in my dreams I sometimes even manage to save the Imperium a couple of times over," {n}Solomorne replies with a strained smile, not a hint of mirth in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, en algunos sueños hasta logro salvar el Imperium varias veces». {n}La sonrisa de Solomorne es forzada y no alcanza sus ojos.{/n}

languages.text: “噢，如果是梦里的话，我有好几次拯救了整个帝国呢。”{n}索罗蒙勉强笑着回答，但眼神中没有一丝笑意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, in my dreams I sometimes even manage to save the Imperium a couple of times over," {n}Solomorne replies with a strained smile, not a hint of mirth in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，如果是梦里的话，我有好几次拯救了整个帝国呢。”{n}索罗蒙勉强笑着回答，但眼神中没有一丝笑意。{/n}

languages.text: "Sorma. Bazen İmparator'u defalarca kurtardığım bile oldu." {n}Solomorne, belli belirsiz bir gülümsemeyle yanıtlıyor. Gözlerinde ise neşeden eser yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, in my dreams I sometimes even manage to save the Imperium a couple of times over," {n}Solomorne replies with a strained smile, not a hint of mirth in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sorma. Bazen İmparator'u defalarca kurtardığım bile oldu," {n}diye yanıtlıyor Solomorne belli belirsiz bir gülümsemeyle. Gözlerinde ise neşeden eser yok.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, in meinen Träumen gelingt es mir sogar ab und an, das Imperium zu retten", {n}erwidert Solomorne mit einem gequälten Lächeln und ohne jede Heiterkeit in den Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, in my dreams I sometimes even manage to save the Imperium a couple of times over," {n}Solomorne replies with a strained smile, not a hint of mirth in his eyes.{/n}
